# 快速排序

采⽤⼆分法，取出中间数，数组每次和中间数⽐较，⼩的放到左边，⼤的放到右边

```javascript
const arr = [85, 24, 63, 45, 17, 31, 96, 50];
function quickSort(arr){
  if(arr.length == 0){
    return []
  }

  const arrindex = Math.floor(arr.length/2)
  const c = arr.splice(arrindex,1) //取出中间数
  const left = []
  const right =[]

  for(let i= 0; i<arr.length; i++){
    if(arr[i]<c){
    left.push(arr[i])
    }else{
    right.push(arr[i])
  }

  }
return quickSort(left).concat([c],quickSort(right))
}
console.log(quickSort(arr))
```
